column1: The hypothesis contains 0 counts of 4-gram overlaps. Therefore the BLEU score evaluates to 0, independently of how many N-gram overlaps of lower order it contains.
Consider using lower n-gram order or use SmoothingFunction()

column2: <s> Mon intelligente Else est si travailleuse qu' elle ne pense jamais à rentrer à la maison et à manger . </s>
<s> INTELLIGENTE TRAVAILLEUSE NE JAMAIS MAISON ELSE PENSE RENTRER MANGER </s>
<s> BIEN GENS NE PAS JAMAIS MAISON RENTRER </s>
<s> BIEN NE PAS JAMAIS VU AVOIR FAIRE </s>
<s> avec sept petites assiettes et sept petites cuillères , </s>
<s> SEPT PETITES ASSIETTES SEPT PETITES CUILLERES </s>
<s> il n' y a pas de lumière à obtenir . </s>
